name: Cryptocurrency NFT
author: How To Create A Press Release

sections.description:
Displays a list of cryptocurrency NFT sites in your WordPress sidebar or any widget area of your wordpress blog. Please visit our site to learn more at https://prwirepro.com

Displays in your sidebar or any menu area that allows you to use widgets, a list of cryptocurrency NFT sites in your WordPress sidebar or any widget area of your wordpress blog.

Please visit howtocreateapressrelease.com to learn more about the plugin. For any questions about the plugin or help with the plugin please contact our support team at anytime through our website – Contact howtocreateapressrelease support Visit our website to find the best Press Release Distribution Services or download our other plugin available on wordpress.org press release distribution plugin. To learn more about press release distribution reviews, please visit https://pressreleasereviews.com.

Credits
sections.installation:
1. Unzip and Upload cryptocurrency-nft.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory inside of a folder named “/cryptocurrency-nft”

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Then go to the Widgets section of your wordpress site and simply drag and drop the widget titled “Cryptocurrency NFT” to any widget area of your website. You can also activate the widget through any wordpress menu on your site.
sections.faq:
What minimum version of WordPress is required?

This plugin requires minimum version 3.4 or later of WordPress.

What are the licensing terms?

This plugin is available for free under the GNU General Public License, Version 2.

What is the latest tested version of WordPress this is compatible with?

This plugin has been tested up to version 5.9.3 of WordPress.

Does this plugin have any issues with any other plugins or themes?

This plugin is safe and fully tested with all current version of WordPress. Works fine with all other plugins, works perfectly with yoast wordpress seo plugin, contact form 7, akismet, also jetpack, and also works perfectly with any theme, no compatibility issues with any plugins or any other themes. This plugin is tested and safe for your wp site or blog and fully responsive and tested in all browsers.
